companies.company_name: TRANSURBAN GROUP ORDINARY SHARES UNITS STAPLED SECURITIES

key_risks: Regulatory and public opposition risks due to changes in government policies and environmental concerns
High financial leverage and vulnerability to rising interest rates or economic downturns
Revenue dependency on traffic volumes, which are sensitive to economic conditions and commuting patterns
Potential challenges to dividend sustainability due to high debt levels and revenue fluctuations
controversies: Public and environmental opposition to new toll road projects
Potential delays or cancellations of expansion projects due to regulatory or public pushback
environmental_issues: Environmental concerns related to land use and infrastructure development
social_issues: Public opposition to toll road projects impacting local communities
governance_issues: Regulatory risks associated with government policies and concession agreements
